name: Deadly Tropics
description:
Deadly Tropics takes you to the beautiful tropical island. Unfortunately, the island will be a trap with hoards of deadly zombies. Survive and find the way to get out from the island.

Deadly Tropics is a third person shooter with stealth elements. Shoot zombies using 10 weapons, sneak and kill unnoticed, use covers to hide.

The game is made to make fun and engaging gameplay.
This is an Indie production mainly made by one single person with passion.
